About

T. Lanette Pollard

My name is T. Lanette Pollard. My journey towards becoming a Front-End Web Developer started over a year and a half ago. I became interested in computer coding after a parent approached me about sponsoring the "Hour of Code" &#40;Code.org) at our school. Once I attended a training session in New York City, I was hooked!

I started working on tutorials at FreeCodeCamp in January 2017. My goal is to earn my certificate and work in Front-End Web Development after I retire from teaching in two years.

Acquired Skills

HTML5 100%

CSS 95%

JavaScript 60%
